findings.title: H01. Front Running Attack
findings.description: The functions swap tokens without setting proper slippage, enabling users to set amountOutMin as zero, making performing sandwich attacks possible and leading to a loss of funds.

findings.title: M01. Contradiction - Unfinalized Code
findings.description: Unfinished or unfinalized code found in the smart contract.

findings.title: L01. Missing Zero Address Validation
findings.description: Address parameters are used without checking against the possibility of 0x0.

findings.title: Flashloan Attack
findings.description: When working with exchange rates, they should be received from a trusted source and not be vulnerable to short-term rate changes that can be achieved by using flash loans. Oracles should be used.
